mapper.select: select cnt.cpn_cd as "cpnCd" ,usr.usr_nm as "usrNm" ,cnt.con_cd as "conCd" ,cnt.con_dtl as "conDtl" ,concat(substring(st_dt,1,4),'-',substring(st_dt,5,2),'-',substring(st_dt,7)) as "stFullDt" ,cnt.st_dt as "stDt" ,cnt.st_tm as "stTm" ,(select com_dtl_nm from sch.sch_com_cd where com_dtl_cd = cnt.st_tm) as "stTmNm" ,concat(substring(ed_dt,1,4),'-',substring(ed_dt,5,2),'-',substring(ed_dt,7)) as "edFullDt" ,cnt.ed_dt as "edDt" ,cnt.ed_tm as "edTm" from sch.sch_cnt_ctrl cnt inner join sch.sch_usr usr on usr.cpn_cd = cnt.cpn_cd and usr.usr_id = cnt.usr_id where cnt.cpn_cd = #{cpnCd} and substring(cnt.st_dt,1 ,6) = #{date} order by cnt.st_dt, (case when cnt.st_dt != cnt.ed_dt then 0 else 1 end), cnt.st_tm
mapper.insert: with upsert as ( update sch.sch_cnt_ctrl set con_dtl = #{content} ,st_dt = replace(#{stDay}, '-','') ,st_tm = coalesce(#{stTm}, #{allTm}) ,ed_dt = replace(#{edDay}, '-','') ,ed_tm = coalesce(#{edTm}, #{allTm}) ,stat_cd = 'CNT100' where cpn_cd = #{cpnCd} and usr_id = #{usrId} and con_cd = #{conBox} returning 1 ) insert into sch.sch_cnt_ctrl ( cpn_cd ,usr_id ,con_cd ,con_dtl ,st_dt ,st_tm ,ed_dt ,ed_tm ,stat_cd ) select #{cpnCd}::varchar ,#{usrId} ,#{conBox}::varchar ,#{content} ,replace(#{stDay}, '-','') ,coalesce(#{stTm}, #{allTm}) ,replace(#{edDay}, '-','') ,coalesce(#{edTm}, #{allTm}) ,'CNT100' where not exists (select 1 from upsert)
